design.p: We use the best tools in order to deliver the best quality

web.p: We use the best tools in order to deliver the best quality

mobile.p: We use the best tools in order to deliver the best quality

design.illustrator: Adobe Illustrator is a vector graphics editor and design program.
design.xd: Adobe XD is a vector-based user experience design tool for web apps and mobile apps.
design.framer: Framer is primarily a design and prototyping tool.
design.figma: Figma is a free and open-source software tool for creating and sharing digital design and illustration files.
design.photoshop: Adobe Photoshop is a raster graphics editor developed and marketed by Adobe Systems Incorporated.

frontend.react: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
frontend.angular: Angular is a JavaScript framework for building single-page applications.
frontend.nextjs: Next.js is a framework for building efficient and accessible websites.
frontend.vue: Vue.js is a progressive framework for building user interfaces.
frontend.javascript: JavaScript is a programming language that conforms to the ECMAScript specification.
frontend.html: HTML is the standard markup language for creating web pages and web applications.
frontend.css: CSS is a language used for describing the presentation of a document written in a markup language.
frontend.tailwind: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework for quickly building complex components with a clean, consistent design.

animation.ae: After Effects is a software application used to create, edit, and view digital video and audio files.
animation.blender: Blender is a free and open-source 3D animation software package.
animation.premiere: Adobe Premiere Pro is a professional video editing software application developed by Adobe Systems Incorporated.

backend.laravel: Laravel is a free, open-source PHP web framework, created by Taylor Otwell and intended for the development of web applications following the model–view–controller (MVC) architectural pattern.
backend.php: PHP is a server-side scripting language designed for web development but also used as a general-purpose programming language.
backend.nodejs: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.
backend.mongo: MongoDB is a free and open-source document-oriented database program.
backend.mysql: MySQL is a free and open-source relational database management system (RDBMS) based on SQL.
backend.postgresql: PostgreSQL is a free and open-source object-relational database system (ORDBMS) written in the programming language PostgreSQL.
backend.nestjs: NestJS is a framework for building efficient and scalable Node. js server-side applications built with and fully supporting TypeScript.

mobiledev.xcode: Xcode is a software development kit (SDK) for iOS and macOS.
mobiledev.androidstudio: Android Studio is a free and open-source IDE for Android development.

hybrid.pwa: Progressive Web Apps (PWA) are websites that are built using the latest web technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
hybrid.flutter: Flutter is a cross-platform framework for building high-performance apps for iOS, Android, web, and desktop from a single codebase.
hybrid.reactnative: React Native is a framework for building native apps using React and the Flutter SDK.
